category: Election Fair Committee Regulations/Article 15 (Disciplinary Deliberation Advice)
contents: Article 15 (Disciplinary Deliberation and Advice) ① If a request for reconsideration is made regarding disciplinary action taken by the city/provincial sports association Sports Fair Committee regarding the election of local sports presidents, the Sports Fair Committee of the Sports Council may request advice from the Fair Election Committee. Revised 2020. 11. 05. ② If an application for deliberation or reconsideration is made regarding disciplinary action related to the election of the head of a member event, the Sports Fair Committee of the Sports Association may request advice from the Fair Election Committee. Revised 2020. 11. 05.
